abstract: Steve Wheatcroft and Andrew Loupe share first-round lead at Wells Fargo Championship golf tournament; other golf news noted.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Golf; Two Share Wells Fargo Lead
headline.main: Two Share Wells Fargo Lead; Trump Rebuts Golf Cheating Claim

snippet: Steve Wheatcroft and Andrew Loupe each shot a seven-under-par 65 in rain and steady wind to share the first-round lead in the Wells Fargo Championship.
lead_paragraph: Steve Wheatcroft and Andrew Loupe each shot a seven-under-par 65 in rain and steady wind to share the first-round lead in the Wells Fargo Championship.
